{{cpp/coroutine/coroutine_handle/title|from_promise}}
{{cpp/coroutine/coroutine_handle/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++20|
static coroutine_handle from_promise( Promise&amp; p );
}}

Creates a {{tt|coroutine_handle}} from the promise object of a coroutine. The created {{tt|coroutine_handle}} refers the coroutine, and {{rlpf|promise}} returns a reference to {{c|p}}.

The behavior is undefined if {{c|p}} is not a reference to a promise object. This function is only provided for the primary template, i.e. specializations {{c|std::coroutine_handle&lt;&gt;}} and {{c|std::coroutine_handle&lt;std::noop_coroutine_promise&gt;}} do not have this function.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|p|promise object of a coroutine to refer}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
A {{tt|coroutine_handle}} referring the given coroutine.
